title: Back Apron (Arkalik)
description: cotton label 158; two hand-sewn dark red woven panels, with diagonal multicolored embroidery on half and horizontal multicolored embroidery on other half of each panel; each panel has a short self fringe on one end and an attached long knotted fringe on other; one corner has braided tie
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
